title: Stay With Me: AMBW Romance
description: Silicon Valley, California - Keyon Yoon is the young blasian chief financial officer of an up and coming multinational technology company. His character is exact as the numbers that he likes to crunch.Kiana Sullivan is a talented software engineer at the same company. They each find themselves in a sticky situation and become roommates by necessity. What could possibly go wrong? Happily Ever After, Office Romance, New Adult, short reads, Blasian, Rom-Com, Romantic Comedy
author: Love Journey
